replies.body:
If I were you I'd add a lip of blocks along the side to stop people from swimming up the water.
Plus if they try to use it to get to you one quick bow shot will have them off the map ^_^
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
the water isnt a good idea since they can bridge over if you replace it with slab or fences that would be good?

why the water isnt a good idea: rushers and bridgers :)
